dct_title_s: Pharus - Plan Berlin. Beilage zum Fuehrer des Hotel Adlon
dct_description_sm: Pharus-Verlag. Alternate title: Short guide of Berlin with map of city. Verso: Information for the 1930 Exhibition and fairs. Relevant buildings are shown pictorially.
